title: Abu Simbel
description: The site of two temples constructed by Ramesses II, one dedicated to the triad of Amun, Ra-Horakhty, and Ptah, as well as the deified Ramesses, and another dedicated to Hathor and the pharaoh's wife Nefertari. The temple was relocated between 1964 and 1968 to prevent its submersion under Lake Nasser after the construction of the Aswan High Dam.

properties.description: The smaller of the two temples at Abu Simbel, dedicated to the goddess Hathor and the deified queen Nefertari.  The temple was relocated between 1964 and 1968 to prevent its submersion under Lake Nasser after the construction of the Aswan High Dam.
properties.title: The Temple to Nefertari at Abu Simbel (Current Location)
